conbody.p: Clicking on this menu entry will open the PDF version of the user manual.
Clicking on this menu entry will open the HTML version of the user manual.
Choose software to add to your BTS.
Choose to see which parts of software are installed. Select a specific path. Click "Uninstall" at the bottom of this window to uninstall selected parts of the program.
NOTE: This does not uninstall BTS. To uninstall BTS you have to manually delete all files from the installation path.
